data.name: XSimpleMailMessage
desc: This interface lets a client set or get the information of a simple mail message.

methods.name: getAttachement
desc: To get the attachment of a simple mail message.

methods.name: getBccRecipient
desc: To get the BCC recipients of a simple mail message.
If no BCC recipients have been specified an empty sequence will be returned.

methods.name: getCcRecipient
desc: To get the cc recipients of a simple mail message.
If no cc recipients have been specified an empty sequence will be returned.

methods.name: getOriginator
desc: To get the email address of the originator of a simple mail message.
If no originator has been specified an empty string will be returned.

methods.name: getRecipient
desc: To get the recipient of the simple mail message.

methods.name: getSubject
desc: To get the subject of a simple mail message.
If no subject has been specified an empty string will be returned.

methods.name: setAttachement
desc: To set an attachment of a simple mail message.

methods.name: setBccRecipient
desc: To set the BCC recipient of a simple mail message.

methods.name: setCcRecipient
desc: To set the cc recipients of a simple mail message.
The method does not check if the given addresses are valid. An empty sequence means there are no cc recipients.

methods.name: setOriginator
desc: To set the email address of the originator of a simple mail message.

methods.name: setRecipient
desc: To set the recipient of the simple mail message.

methods.name: setSubject
desc: To set the subject of a simple mail message.
